title: Australia Last Day - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
Keep calm and Bondi Beach. After the storm, the calm doesnâ€™t return completely but indeed ins quite better, the day is still gray but not rainfall and no windy.

In our last day in Australia, we decided to do a short visit to the legendary Bondi Beach the view is spectacular and despite the temperature and the high waves, some courageous swimmers and surfer try their luck in the ocean.
